answers.answer: No at all. I'm sure ull get some ppl complaining that u r but I wanted induced at 37 weeks cuz of being miserable n I came to my 36 week appt to b admitted and induced at 37 bcuz of preeclampsia :/ sucky reason but at least its 2 weeks earlier then they planned and won't b the week of thanksgiving. It'll b a calmer holiday week then originally planned

I am experiencing the same and am 33 and 4 days. I've experienced the worst with my pregnancy and can't wait to just have him in the world. At my next apmnt my doctor and I are supposed to discuss how I want to deliver and so on. I'm really hoping he can come out early...but safe.

question: I'm 32 weeks pregnant and very uncomfortable!!!!!  I'm having pains in my hip, side , and stomach. Keep getting woken up in my sleep with terrible tighting of the stomach. I have absolutely no cravings for food. I know all pregnancies are different, but this is my worst ever. I'm want to get induced at 38 weeks, mostly because I can't stand the pain n the discomfort! Does this make me selfish????
title: Ready to pop!!!!
